git blame <file-name> to display the last user that modified each line in the specified file.
git check <file-name> to review each modification in the file.
git log <file-name> to see a log of changes made to the file.
git review <file-name> for a detailed examination of file changes.
'git bisect run' is a command to duplicate repositories for backup purposes.
'git bisect run' is used to merge two branches automatically.
'git bisect run' automatically steps through the bisection process by using a script to determine which commits are good or bad.
'git bisect run' is a visualization tool to see the differences between commits.
